V1: forecasting is not the primary focus of the paper, but there is one section where they do forecast P concentrations ~ 8 yrs into the future
V2: My best guess is that it is <10yr based on the model descriptions but this will definitely be a paper we review further.

V3: yes; hard to tell if they're using forecasted drivers, little detail on forecasting methods
V5: Yes, but this is going to be rough...
V9: yes. Hindcasts, nowcasts, and 3 day forecasts
V10: yes; I *think* they were using hindcasted drivers for at least part of the dataset although the way they describe divvying up their training/testing/forecasting period is pretty tough to follow
V11: yes; forecasting sea otters 5 years out
V12: yes; annual forecasts of hornet nest location
V14: is a forecast! but is a meta-analysis of multiple forecast studies, addressing model complexity and predictability. could be used to assess multiple studies
